channel.title: Comments on: One more mail system

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Ok, the last domain had been migrated to Google.
item.content:encoded: Ok, the last domain had been migrated to Google.

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Just counted again - I'm managing mail system for 8 domains, though 2 of them will be retired this month. All those 8 mail systems were running on 3 separated servers, and I've migrated 5 to Google mail include the one I finished yesterday. Other than those 2 to be retired, there is only one mail system to be migrated, but depend on my friend's decision.
Anti-spam and anti-virus is really memory-bounded application, BTW.
item.content:encoded:
Just counted again – I’m managing mail system for 8 domains, though 2 of them will be retired this month. All those 8 mail systems were running on 3 separated servers, and I’ve migrated 5 to Google mail include the one I finished yesterday. Other than those 2 to be retired, there is only one mail system to be migrated, but depend on my friend’s decision.

Anti-spam and anti-virus is really memory-bounded application, BTW.
